sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_2d305c6cdb12e0102ed422e64896190c
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_radi_ghact.DevOpsGitHubActionsIntegrationHandler</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>DevOpsGitHubActionsIntegrationHandler</name><script><![CDATA[var DevOpsGitHubActionsIntegrationHandler = Class.create();
DevOpsGitHubActionsIntegrationHandler.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },
	
	/***
	 * parseActionWorkflowResponse - parse valid orchestration tasks out of a gh actions api payload
	 *
	 * @param payload - api payload from /{repo}/actions/workflow
	 * @return orchestrationTasks
	 */
	parseActionWorkflowResponse: function(payload) {
		var workflows = payload.workflows;
		var orchestrationTasks = [];
		for (i = 0; i < payload.total_count; i++) {
			var orchestrationTask = { "name": workflows[i].name, "url": workflows[i].html_url };
			orchestrationTasks.push(JSON.stringify(orchestrationTask));
		}
		
		return orchestrationTasks;
	},
	
	/***
	 * updateImportRequestPayload
	 *
	 * @param payload - an orchestration task object
	 * @param importRequest - gr of import request
	 */
	updateImportRequestPayload: function(orchestrationTask, importRequest) {
		var transformedPayload;
		
		if (gs.nil(importRequest.x_radi_ghact_transformed_payload)) {
			transformedPayload = {};
			orchestrationTask = JSON.parse(orchestrationTask);
			transformedPayload.pipelines = [orchestrationTask];
			importRequest.x_radi_ghact_transformed_payload = JSON.stringify(transformedPayload);
			importRequest.update();
			return;
		}
		
		transformedPayload = importRequest.x_radi_ghact_transformed_payload;
		transformedPayload = JSON.parse(transformedPayload);
		transformedPayload.pipelines.push(JSON.parse(orchestrationTask));
		
		importRequest.x_radi_ghact_transformed_payload = JSON.stringify(transformedPayload);
		importRequest.update();
	},
	
    type: 'DevOpsGitHubActionsIntegrationHandler'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>mike@rapdev.io</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-02-09 14:10:02</sys_created_on><sys_id>2d305c6cdb12e0102ed422e64896190c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>19</sys_mod_count><sys_name>DevOpsGitHubActionsIntegrationHandler</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Github Actions" source="x_radi_ghact">8c30ff4bdb0268102ed422e648961964</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Github Actions">8c30ff4bdb0268102ed422e648961964</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_2d305c6cdb12e0102ed422e64896190c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>mike@rapdev.io</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-02-10 17:19:27</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_c16e59fcdbd6e010a269dbc668961931
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="DELETE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_radi_ghact.DevOpsGitHubActionsOrchIntegrationHandler</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description>Implements extension point sn_devops.DevOpsOrchestrationToolIntegrationHandler
DevOpsOrchestrationToolIntegrationHandler - Endpoint Interface to determine right tool handler</description><name>DevOpsGitHubActionsOrchIntegrationHandler</name><script><![CDATA[var DevOpsGitHubActionsOrchIntegrationHandler = Class.create();
DevOpsGitHubActionsOrchIntegrationHandler.prototype = {

    /*
    Validate if this is the right tool handler for a given tool name.
    */
    handleTool: function(toolName) {
        return false;
    },

    /*
    Handle the orchestration tool notification event
    */
    handleEvent: function() {
        throw 'Implement handleEvent()';
    },

    /*
    Get the native id for the orchestration task, from stepMapping or changeControl request payloads
    */
    getNativeIdForOrchestrationTask: function() {
        throw 'Implement getNativeIdForOrchestrationTask()';
    },

    /*
    Get the native id for the orchestration task, from an orchestration tool notification event payload
    */
    getNativeIdForOrchestrationTaskFromEvent: function() {
        throw 'Implement getNativeIdForOrchestrationTaskFromEvent()';
    },

    /*
    Get the url for the orchestration task, from an orchestration tool notification event payload
    */
    getOrchestrationTaskUrl: function() {
        throw 'Implement getOrchestrationTaskUrl()';
    },

    /*
    Get the native id for the task execution, from an orchestration tool notification event payload
    */
    getNativeIdForTaskExecution: function() {
        throw 'Implement getNativeIdForTaskExecution()';
    },

    /*
    Get the url for the task execution, from an orchestration tool notification event payload
    */
    getTaskExecutionUrl: function() {
        throw 'Implement getTaskExecutionUrl()';
    },

    /*
    Implement what should be done in case the given orchestration task is not under change control
    */
    resumeJob: function() {
        throw 'Implement resumeJob()';
    },

    /*
    Implement the sending of the callback response to the orchestration tool
    */
    notifyWithCallback: function() {
        throw 'Implement notifyWithCallback()';
    },

    /*
    Get the body of the callback response to be sent to the orchestration tool
    */
    getNotifyBodyForOrchTool: function() {
        throw 'Implement getNotifyBodyForOrchTool()';
    },

    /*
    Perform any transformations to the callback request originated from the orchestration tool
    */
    transformCallbackRequest: function() {
        throw 'Implement transformCallbackRequest()';
    },

    /*
    Implement what should be done to handle the reattempt of callback request when callback record already exists 
    */
    handleCallbackReattempt: function() {
        throw 'Implement handleCallbackReattempt()';
    },
	
	/*
	Return true if stage name includes job name
	*/
	stageNameIncludesJobName: function(){
		return false;
	},

    type: 'DevOpsGitHubActionsOrchIntegrationHandler'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>mike@rapdev.io</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-02-10 14:29:52</sys_created_on><sys_id>c16e59fcdbd6e010a269dbc668961931</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>DevOpsGitHubActionsOrchIntegrationHandler</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Github Actions" source="x_radi_ghact">8c30ff4bdb0268102ed422e648961964</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Github Actions">8c30ff4bdb0268102ed422e648961964</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_c16e59fcdbd6e010a269dbc668961931</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>mike@rapdev.io</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-02-10 14:32:27</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_b86042b8db5ae010a269dbc6689619b2
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="DELETE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_radi_ghact.DevOpsGitHubActionsOrchestrationToolIntegrationHandler</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description>Implements extension point sn_devops.DevOpsOrchestrationToolIntegrationHandler
DevOpsOrchestrationToolIntegrationHandler - Endpoint Interface to determine right tool handler</description><name>DevOpsGitHubActionsOrchestrationToolIntegrationHandler</name><script><![CDATA[var DevOpsGitHubActionsOrchestrationToolIntegrationHandler = Class.create();
DevOpsGitHubActionsOrchestrationToolIntegrationHandler.prototype = {

    /*
    Validate if this is the right tool handler for a given tool name.
    */
    handleTool: function(toolName) {
        return false;
    },

    /*
    Handle the orchestration tool notification event
    */
    handleEvent: function() {
        throw 'Implement handleEvent()';
    },

    /*
    Get the native id for the orchestration task, from stepMapping or changeControl request payloads
    */
    getNativeIdForOrchestrationTask: function(payload) {
		sn_devops.DevOpsLogger.log("DevOpsGitHubActionsOrchestrationToolIntegrationHandler.getNativeIdForOrchestrationTask() payload -> " + JSON.stringify(payload));
        return payload.orchestrationTaskName;
    },

    /*
    Get the native id for the orchestration task, from an orchestration tool notification event payload
    */
    getNativeIdForOrchestrationTaskFromEvent: function() {
        throw 'Implement getNativeIdForOrchestrationTaskFromEvent()';
    },

    /*
    Get the url for the orchestration task, from an orchestration tool notification event payload
    */
    getOrchestrationTaskUrl: function() {
     throw 'Implement getOrchestrationTaskUrl()';
    },

    /*
    Get the native id for the task execution, from an orchestration tool notification event payload
    */
    getNativeIdForTaskExecution: function() {				
        throw 'Implement getNativeIdForTaskExecution()';
    },

    /*
    Get the url for the task execution, from an orchestration tool notification event payload
    */
    getTaskExecutionUrl: function() {
        throw 'Implement getTaskExecutionUrl()';
    },

    /*
    Implement what should be done in case the given orchestration task is not under change control
    */
    resumeJob: function() {
        throw 'Implement resumeJob()';
    },

    /*
    Implement the sending of the callback response to the orchestration tool
    */
    notifyWithCallback: function() {
        throw 'Implement notifyWithCallback()';
    },

    /*
    Get the body of the callback response to be sent to the orchestration tool
    */
    getNotifyBodyForOrchTool: function() {
        throw 'Implement getNotifyBodyForOrchTool()';
    },

    /*
    Perform any transformations to the callback request originated from the orchestration tool
    */
    transformCallbackRequest: function() {
        throw 'Implement transformCallbackRequest()';
    },

    /*
    Implement what should be done to handle the reattempt of callback request when callback record already exists 
    */
    handleCallbackReattempt: function() {
        throw 'Implement handleCallbackReattempt()';
    },
	
	/*
	Return true if stage name includes job name
	*/
	stageNameIncludesJobName: function(){
		return false;
	},

    type: 'DevOpsGitHubActionsOrchestrationToolIntegrationHandler'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>mike@rapdev.io</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-02-10 16:58:24</sys_created_on><sys_id>b86042b8db5ae010a269dbc6689619b2</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>DevOpsGitHubActionsOrchestrationToolIntegrationHandler</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Github Actions" source="x_radi_ghact">8c30ff4bdb0268102ed422e648961964</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Github Actions">8c30ff4bdb0268102ed422e648961964</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_b86042b8db5ae010a269dbc6689619b2</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>mike@rapdev.io</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-02-10 16:58:36</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_8bd88a30db9ae010a269dbc6689619bb
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_radi_ghact.DevOpsGitHubActionsOrchestrationToolIntegrationHandler</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description>Implements extension point sn_devops.DevOpsOrchestrationToolIntegrationHandler
DevOpsOrchestrationToolIntegrationHandler - Endpoint Interface to determine right tool handler</description><name>DevOpsGitHubActionsOrchestrationToolIntegrationHandler</name><script><![CDATA[var DevOpsGitHubActionsOrchestrationToolIntegrationHandler = Class.create();
DevOpsGitHubActionsOrchestrationToolIntegrationHandler.prototype = {

	initialize: function() {},
    /*
    Validate if this is the right tool handler for a given tool name.
    */
    handleTool: function(toolName) {
        return false;
    },

    /*
    Handle the orchestration tool notification event
    */
    handleEvent: function() {
        throw 'Implement handleEvent()';
    },

    /*
    Get the native id for the orchestration task, from stepMapping or changeControl request payloads
    */
    getNativeIdForOrchestrationTask: function(payload) {
		// native id is in the payload, so just return it
		if (payload.orchestrationTaskName) {
			return payload.orchestrationTaskName;
		}
		
		// we have the task URL
		if (payload.taskUrl) {
			var gr = new GlideRecord("sn_devops_orchestration_task");
			if (gr.get("task_url", payload.taskUrl)) {
				return gr.native_id;
			}
		}
    },

    /*
    Get the native id for the orchestration task, from an orchestration tool notification event payload
    */
    getNativeIdForOrchestrationTaskFromEvent: function() {
        throw 'Implement getNativeIdForOrchestrationTaskFromEvent()';
    },

    /*
    Get the url for the orchestration task, from an orchestration tool notification event payload
    */
    getOrchestrationTaskUrl: function() {
        throw 'Implement getOrchestrationTaskUrl()';
    },

    /*
    Get the native id for the task execution, from an orchestration tool notification event payload
    */
    getNativeIdForTaskExecution: function() {
        throw 'Implement getNativeIdForTaskExecution()';
    },

    /*
    Get the url for the task execution, from an orchestration tool notification event payload
    */
    getTaskExecutionUrl: function() {
        throw 'Implement getTaskExecutionUrl()';
    },

    /*
    Implement what should be done in case the given orchestration task is not under change control
    */
    resumeJob: function() {
        //throw 'Implement resumeJob()';
    },

    /*
    Implement the sending of the callback response to the orchestration tool
    */
    notifyWithCallback: function(grTool, endPoint, headers, data) {
        var devOpsConnector = new sn_devops.DevOpsConnector();
        var result = {};
        var response;
		gs.info("data.... " + JSON.stringify(data));
		var label = "snc-change" + data.result;
		var issueBody = {"state": "closed", "labels": [label]};
        if (!devOpsConnector._getConnectionInfo(grTool.connection_alias)) {
            result.errorMessage = gs.getMessage('Failed to get connection info from the alias');
            return result;
        }

        try {
            var restMessage = devOpsConnector._setUpRESTMessage(endPoint,  sn_devops.DevOpsCommonConstants.HTTP_METHOD_POST, headers, issueBody);
            response = restMessage.execute();
            var statusCode = response.getStatusCode();
            result.statusCode = statusCode;
			gs.info("gha -- status code was ... " + statusCode);
            if (response.haveError())
                sn_devops.DevOpsLogger.log('Failed to notify orchestration tool with change decision status code: ' + statusCode);

        } catch (error) {
            if (error)
                result.errorMessage = error.toString();
            else
                result.errorMessage = sn_devops.DevOpsCommonMessages.UNKNOWN_FAILURE_MSG;
        }
        return result;
    },

    /*
    Get the body of the callback response to be sent to the orchestration tool
    */
    getNotifyBodyForOrchTool: function(payload) {
		gs.info('getNotifyBodyForOrchTool payload ' + JSON.stringify(payload));
        if (gs.nil(payload)) {
			return {};
		}
		
		return {};
    },

    /*
    Perform any transformations to the callback request originated from the orchestration tool
    */
    transformCallbackRequest: function(payload, toolGr) {
        return payload;
    },

    /*
    Implement what should be done to handle the reattempt of callback request when callback record already exists 
    */
    handleCallbackReattempt: function() {
        throw 'Implement handleCallbackReattempt()';
    },
	
	/*
	Return true if stage name includes job name
	*/
	stageNameIncludesJobName: function(){
		return false;
	},
	
	getCallBack: function(callbackGr, payload) {
		if(callbackGr && callbackGr.hasNext()) {
			callbackGr.next();
			return callbackGr;
		}
	},

    type: 'DevOpsGitHubActionsOrchestrationToolIntegrationHandler'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>mike@rapdev.io</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-02-10 17:35:26</sys_created_on><sys_id>8bd88a30db9ae010a269dbc6689619bb</sys_id><sys_mod_count>23</sys_mod_count><sys_name>DevOpsGitHubActionsOrchestrationToolIntegrationHandler</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Github Actions" source="x_radi_ghact">8c30ff4bdb0268102ed422e648961964</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Github Actions">8c30ff4bdb0268102ed422e648961964</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_8bd88a30db9ae010a269dbc6689619bb</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>mike@rapdev.io</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-04-20 14:18:13</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
